info.whatIdo: I build and develop mobile app.
info.iDoNotDo: I don't want use gatsby never again!!!
info.aboutMe: The Front End Developer is responsible for creating and implementing visual and interactive elements in a web application that users can actively engage with through their web browser. They work with back end developers as well who are responsible for all server-side applications that help a web site run properly and efficiently. Being a Front End Developer means you are extremely knowledgeable with front-end technology including interpreting graphic visuals and designs in development languages HTML, CSS and JavaScript. All these are used for coding design to make a web site look and feel amazing to the end user.
